tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE parent_involvement (
  parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  involvement_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  activity_interest VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ParentInvolvement (
    parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_name TEXT,
    activity_id INT,
    activity_name TEXT,
    involvement_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE ActivityProgramming (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name TEXT,
    activity_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    program_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE parent_activities (
 parent_id INT,
 activity_id INT,
 involvement_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_involvement(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES extracurricular_activities(id)
);
